# [CORE-797] Update to go v1.18.10 to fix net-package vulnerability

**oredavids** commented *Apr 18, 2023*

<!--

## Description

Fixes [net-package vulnerability](https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-69cg-p879-7622) by updating to a patched Go version & updated go-commons package.

[CORE-797]
